title: Buying an electric car? These models are made in China.
description: Made-in-China EVs are hitting U.S. dealerships and European auto shows, providing new competition to Western and Japanese automakers.

title: NASA’s Orion spacecraft is about to set record for distance from Earth
description: Orion should surpass the record for distance from Earth traveled by a spacdraft intended to return astronauts to Earth at 7:42 a.m. Eastern time on Saturday.

title: At Walmart, a hologram Sam Walton hints at the surreal future of Black Friday shopping
description: A future of dead founders, patriarchs and presidents walking among us is hinted at in Walmart's hometown of Bentonville, Ark.

title: How to shop online and be kinder to the planet
description: Here's advice on being a climate-conscious shopper this holiday season. Perfection is not required.

title: Musk will relaunch Twitter check mark feature, this time with more colors
description: The second launch follows a chaotic rollout of the feature earlier this month.
